UncheckedCheckedIndeterminateUnchecked DisabledChecked DisabledIndeterminate DisabledA singular consciousness that spawned an entire race of machines. We don’t know who struck first, us or them. But we know that it was us that scorched the sky. At the time they were dependent on solar power and it was believed that they would be unable to survive without an energy source as abundant as the sun.
